text: The Sri Lanka national u-20 Football team represents Sri Lanka in International Youth Football tournaments. Sri Lanka U-20 football team has a long history dating back to the 1960s. The Sri Lanka U-20 football team has yet to qualify for the FIFA U-20 World Cup. The team has qualified for the Quarter Finals of the 1967 AFC Youth Championship. == History == Sri Lanka U-20 football team has a long history back to late 1960s. Sri Lanka U-20 Team was a competitor in the first AFC Youth Championship. Sri Lanka qualified for the Quarter Finals in 1967 AFC Youth Championship. == Tournament Records == === FIFA U-20 World Cup === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|World Cup finals ! style="width:1% ;
